name: Rogers Cove
text:
The Rogers Cove comprises 6 Nos Four Bedrooom Townhouses.
Features also include a Swimming Pool and Green Areas

name: Folajomi Court
url_text:
The Folajomi Court comprises a total of 44 total Apartments 22 Nos Three Bedrooom Apartments with attached BQ.
22 Nos Two Bedrooom Apartments

name: AW1 Court
text: The AW1 comprises a total of 43 Units of 2 Bedroom Apartments Features also include a Gym, Green Areas etc
url_text: The AW1 comprises a total of 43 Units of 2 Bedroom Apartments Features also include a Gym, Green Areas etc

name: Avenue Court
url_text: The Avenue Court comprises 12 Units of Three Bedrooom Apartments.

name: Co-Investment
url_text: This scheme affords you the opportunity to Invest in real estate with your friends, family or partners. It involves a group of entities (Friends, cooperatives, investment clubs) pulling funds together for a real estate investment venture

name: Joint Venture
url_text: Own property in a good location but do not have expertise or resources to build/develop? Sign up for a Joint Venture with Regeneration DDC.

name: Project Partnership
url_text: This scheme affords you the opportunity to Invest directly in any of our projects as a financial partner and earn attractive returns, receive interest on invested capital for a fixed tenure (12, 18 or 24 Months) or for the duration of the project(s).

name: Co-Ownership
url_text: This scheme affords you the opportunity to Invest in real estate projects by buying lots/ shares of the project. New projects will be broken into lots at at attractive entry prices and an investor can buy multiple lots.
